Name: Alba
Description: A county in the central part of Romania, known for its natural beauty and historic castles.

Name: Arad
Description: Located in western Romania, Arad is known for its rich history, including numerous architectural landmarks.

Name: Arges
Description: A county in southern Romania, home to important historical sites and scenic landscapes.

Name: Bacau
Description: A county in northeastern Romania, known for its natural parks and cultural heritage.

Name: Bihor
Description: Located in western Romania, Bihor is known for its natural beauty and the famous city of Oradea.

Name: Bistrita-Nasaud
Description: A county in northern Romania, rich in folklore, history, and traditional architecture.

Name: Botosani
Description: Located in northeastern Romania, Botosani is known for its cultural traditions and historical sites.

Name: Braila
Description: A county in southeastern Romania, known for its agricultural output and Danube River ports.

Name: Brasov
Description: Located in central Romania, Brasov is known for its medieval architecture, including the famous Bran Castle.

Name: Bucuresti
Description: The capital city of Romania, Bucuresti is the political, economic, and cultural heart of the country.

Name: Buzau
Description: A county in southeastern Romania, known for its natural mineral springs and cultural landmarks.

Name: Calarasi
Description: Located in the southern part of Romania, Calarasi is known for its fertile land and agriculture.

Name: Caras-Severin
Description: A county in southwestern Romania, Caras-Severin is famous for its natural beauty, including the Carpathian Mountains.

Name: Cluj
Description: Located in the northwest, Cluj is known for its cultural and academic significance, including the city of Cluj-Napoca.

Name: Constanta
Description: A county located on the Black Sea coast, known for its beaches, ports, and cultural heritage.

Name: Covasna
Description: A county in central Romania, Covasna is known for its spa resorts and the Szeklerland region.

Name: Dambovita
Description: A county in southern Romania, Dambovita is known for its proximity to Bucharest and rich historical sites.

Name: Dolj
Description: Located in southwestern Romania, Dolj is known for its agricultural output and the city of Craiova.

Name: Galati
Description: A county in southeastern Romania, Galati is a major industrial and port city on the Danube River.

Name: Gorj
Description: A county in southwestern Romania, Gorj is known for its mountainous landscapes and cultural landmarks.
